author: Adam Beam
title: Newsom announces cash payments to illegal immigrants...
description: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — California will be the first state to give cash payments to immigrants living in the country illegally who are hurt by the coronavirus, offering $500 apiece to 150,000...
content: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) California will be the first state to give cash payments to immigrants living in the country illegally who are hurt by the coronavirus, offering $500 apiece to 150,000 adults who were left out of the $2.2 trillion stimulus package appr… [+4651 chars]
